articles.title: ‘Keep your mouth shut’: De Belin’s rape trial hears Dragons star’s alleged threat to victim - Fox Sports
articles.description: The woman who has accused Jack de Belin of sexual assault has told a court of how she went “dead and numb” inside and was powerless to ward off the alleged attack.
